data.message: When did the king of rap become Hollywoods puppet political bitch? I thought he was smarter than that? Lol Someone get this man a Xanax along with all the other stupid liberals because seriously, you're all crazy and blinded by the fake media! Eminem, you're a sellout and you're almost 50. The whole "ghetto" look is wearing thin. Grow up and open your eyes to ACTUAL news and you might learn something. #TRUMP2020 #MAGA #Liberalismfindacure

replies.message: Yeah I've been a fan of eminem since he first came out..but I didn't agree with what all he said about Trump.. because I'm glad he is our president.. but you know em loves to Diss Everyone doesn't matter who they are lol
You are an idiot.
How dare anyone have a different political view /endsarcasm
When was he the King of Rap?
Again. Please see Mosh. You clearly know nothing.
Shane Whatley Um. That's not what this is about. He's pretty clear. This isn't just throwing shade for fun or as an artistic exercise. He means it.

That's what all the Germans said about Adolf !!!! Fucking idiot
you are painfully ignorant
https://media0.giphy.com/media/qMaBTVTRbyka4/giphy.gif
https://youtu.be/7q-NEHj0sPM

McCartney Hull this isn't just a political view.  Trump is a racist, sexist, xenophobe who cares about you as little as he cares about me.  He is single handily tearing our country apart and also trying to start WWIII to boot.  You're okay with all of this, huh?

Calling any celebrity or athlete with a platform they’re using against Trump a puppet is getting old. Maybe the fact that this president is a racist, sexist, xenophobic wannabe-dictator actually doesn’t sit right with Eminem or anyone else speaking out against him, and they’re using whatever means they have to broadcast that message? Literally the definition of free speech 🙄
Joshua Levitt you're a fucking idiot.
Carla Burne maybe the fact that you can't back up any of your claims with actual facts is old.
Yusuf Morgan figures. Trash hangin with trash.
This snowflake lmao

Yeah I thought the same. He seems like a pretty smart, level headed guy, but to buy into the liberal lies about Trump shows how simple and naive he is. Any intelligent person can see that Trump is trying to do what's best for the Country and pull us out of the pit the democrats have put us in. I guess Eminem is just another simpleton.
Yes yes yes!!! This !!!!!
